28.movie_plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

160.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

114.movie_plot: A Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

212.movie_plot: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

197.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

149.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

154.movie_plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

61.movie_plot: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

145.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

177.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

66.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

72.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

56.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

132.movie_plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

6.movie_plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

138.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

43.movie_plot: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

201.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

45.movie_plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

78.movie_plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

208.movie_plot: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

106.movie_plot: When Queen Victoria's husband dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

96.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

35.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

10.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

136.movie_plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York City and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

170.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

110.movie_plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

77.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

194.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

75.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

76.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
76.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

39.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

176.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
176.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

209.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

107.movie_plot: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soapmaker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

69.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

147.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

4.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

213.movie_plot: Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

58.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

29.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
29.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

162.movie_plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

112.movie_plot: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

139.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
139.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

202.movie_plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

211.movie_plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

135.movie_plot: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

87.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

196.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
196.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

164.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

210.movie_plot: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

193.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

64.movie_plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

120.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

167.movie_plot: A town marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.

104.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

24.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

148.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

113.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

131.movie_plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

52.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

214.movie_plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

98.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

189.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
189.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

25.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
25.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

156.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

184.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

19.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

93.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)
93.movie_plot: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

51.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
51.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

3.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

127.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

95.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

21.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

180.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

134.movie_plot: Embarrassed by his large nose, a romantic poet/soldier romances his cousin by proxy.

108.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

124.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

54.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
54.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

101.movie_plot: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

159.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

32.movie_plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

205.movie_plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

182.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

89.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

218.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

71.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

116.movie_plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

188.movie_plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

166.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.
